articles.title: Asteroid 2024 YR4 heading toward Earth: UK scientist warns it might be too late to deflect now - The Times of India
articles.description: US News: Discovered in December 2024, YR4 currently ranks 3 out of 10 on the Torino Scale. Nasa said it is deploying the James Webb Space Telescope to overserv
